summary: This module implements a custom bucket type for HTTP/2 End-of-Stream (EOS) markers in Apache HTTP Server. It manages the lifecycle of EOS buckets, which signal the end of HTTP/2 streams, and dispatches events when streams are completed.

logs.reason: Dispatches an event notification when an HTTP/2 End-of-Stream bucket is destroyed, signaling that the stream has ended. This event may be logged elsewhere in the HTTP/2 implementation.
logs.resolution: This is an informational event indicating normal HTTP/2 stream termination. If unexpected stream terminations occur, investigate client disconnections or server-side stream handling issues.
